Inspection.name: Posterior and Anterior lung fields with deep breaths (verbalize inspection)

Posterior: palpate, percuss, auscultate.name: Correct Technique: cross arms, hands on shoulder to raise scapulae
Tactile Fremitus - "boy" include lateral lung fields here
Percuss posterior lung fields (bilaterally and symmetrically)
Auscultate posterior lung fields (bilaterally and symmetrically)
Correct Technique: full breath per position for auscultation
Correct Technique: instruct patient to breathe through an open mouth

Anterior:Palpate, percuss, auscultate.name: Percuss anterior lung fields (bilaterally and symmetrically)
Auscultate anterior lung fields (bilaterally and symmetrically)
Auscultate apices in supraclavicular fossae with the bell of the stethoscope
